Package control

package control
Contains controllers that handle business logic between models and boundaries.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ApplicantControl
    Control class that contains all the business logic for Applicantâ€‘related actions.
    HDBManagerControl
    Control class that handles all business logic related to HDB Manager actions.
    HDBOfficerControl
    Control class for handling all business logic specific to HDB Officers.
    LoginControl
    Control class that handles user authentication and post-login routing based on user role (Applicant, HDBOfficer, or HDBManager).
